diff_user.user:
An incorrect diff format was detected in this change:
Here's a targeted improvement to enhance the program's ability to create more complex and fluent sentences, specifically by improving how it handles multiple triples and introducing conjunctions more naturally.

```diff
<<<<<<< SEARCH
        else:
            if i > 0:
                sentence += ", and " if i > 1 else " and "
            sentence += f"{triple.predicate} is {triple.object}. "
>>>>>>> REPLACE
        else:
            if i > 0:
                sentence += ", and " if i > 1 else " and "
            sentence += f"{triple.predicate} is {triple.object}. "
            if i < len(triples) - 1:
                sentence += " "
```
Please fix it to the correct format.
